newsitem.title: USA: Associated sees 6-8 pct '97 profit growth.
newsitem.headline: Associated sees 6-8 pct '97 profit growth.

text.p: Associated Banc-Corp expects an investment in technology and facilities to hold its 1997 earnings growth to between six to eight percent, the company said.

But the company said in its annual report that it still expected to achieve or exceed its five-year goals, including 11 percent compound annual growth in earnings per share and at least 15 percent return on equity.

The Green Bay, Wisconsin-based financial services company said it had already spent $20 million of its expected $25 million investment to consolidate its seven regional processing centers into a single facility.
Associated will hold it annual meeting on April 23 in Oshkosh, Wisconsin.
